attributes.action: End or reduce the superfluous Standing Charge on Gas and Electric set by Ofgem.
attributes.additional_details:
To help out struggling Households and Businesses!
It is outdated and unnecessary.
attributes.background: The Government under the current fuel crisis to scrap or reduce this standing charge controlled by Ofgem.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open, which you might like to sign:

Pass a law that prevents the use of standing charges by utility companies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621561
